title: Sketchbook Folio, "Madonna in Glory, Study after Bartolomeo Passeroti Bologna; Architectural Details", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center left: Sabatini Bologna; at lower left: 10; at lower center: monumenti del/ quattro cento
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: At upper section, Madonna and Child supported by numerous putti, float on clouds. At lower section, three friezes, two with acanthus and one with scrolls; part of capital, and scroll decoration with vase.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Madonna in Glory, Study after Bartolomeo Passeroti Bologna; Architectural Details", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3490.
